Package org.apache.fop.fonts.apps

Command-line tools for generating XML font metric files from Type 1 and TrueType fonts.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractFontReader Abstract base class for the PFM and TTF Reader command-line applications.
PFMReader A tool which reads PFM files from Adobe Type 1 fonts and creates XML font metrics file for use in FOP.
TTFReader A tool which reads TTF files and generates XML font metrics file for use in FOP.
 

Package org.apache.fop.fonts.apps Description

Command-line tools for generating XML font metric files from Type 1 and TrueType fonts.
